markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 4" pfs="Standard">[Stormwind Flight](/Spells.aspx?ID=478)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Air" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=5" />
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 400 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Powerful winds carry you smoothly through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as [_feather fall_](/Spells.aspx?ID=111).

---
**Heightened (6th)** When you fly using _stormwind flight_, you don't count flying against the wind as difficult terrain.
name: Stormwind Flight

text: Stormwind Flight Source Core Rulebook pg. 400 4.0 Cast Two Actions somatic, verbal Duration 1 minute --- Powerful winds carry you smoothly through the air, giving you a fly Speed equal to your Speed. When this spell's duration would end, if you're still flying, you float to the ground, as feather fall . --- Heightened (6th) When you fly using stormwind flight , you don't count flying against the wind as difficult terrain.
